sentences.en: A school dental service exists in theory, but in practice, there are few dentists to work in them.
sentences.cn: 照理说，学校也有牙医诊所，可实际上，里面的牙医寥寥无几。

sentences.en: Approve automobile, fire, life, disability, dental or other insurance claims.
sentences.cn: 批准汽车, 火灾, 人身, 残疾, 牙齿以及其他保险理赔.

sentences.en: By this time the dental instruments were ready.
sentences.cn: 这时候,拔牙的准备已经做好了.

sentences.en: Class I occlusion with coordinated dental midline was obtained.
sentences.cn: 治疗后两年追踪观察,齿列情况稳定,外观有良好的改善.

sentences.en: Conclusions EBM in dental field of China is at starting stage.
sentences.cn: 结论在我国口腔医学领域循证医学刚刚起步.

sentences.en: Did you know she worked as a dental hygienist for a Dr. Shider?
sentences.cn: 你知道她在率特医生那里当口腔卫生师?

sentences.en: Good oral hygiene and regular dental care are important, whatever your age.
sentences.cn: 无论年龄大小，良好的口腔卫生和定期的牙齿保健都非常重要。

sentences.en: I had undergone a major dental operation.
sentences.cn: 我经受了一次牙科大手术.

sentences.en: Impacted tooth is a common disease in dental clinics.
sentences.cn: 目的:探讨前牙区埋伏牙的临床特点及治疗.

sentences.en: The earliest record of dental treatment comes from ancient Egypt.
sentences.cn: 最早关于牙病治疗的记载来源于古埃及.

sentences.en: The fees offered by the NHS do not recompense dental surgeons for their professional time.
sentences.cn: 国民医疗保健系统所支付的费用中不涵盖牙科诊疗费用。

sentences.en: THE INFLUENCE OF DENTAL FACTORS TO ERUPTION OF THE MANDIBULAR THIRD MOLAR.
sentences.cn: 牙齿因素对下颌第三磨牙萌出的影响.

sentences.en: Therefore, a need exists to have dental composites with antimicrobial properties.
sentences.cn: 所以, 树脂具备抗菌性能是必要的.

sentences.en: Title: Dental Treatment in the Near Future: Prosthesis or Regeneration?
sentences.cn: 题目: 牙科治疗的发展趋势: 修复抑或再生?

sentences.en: When use dental floss, how to bleed gum lane?
sentences.cn: 使用牙线时, 如何不把牙龈弄出血?

sentences.en: You can get free dental treatment.
sentences.cn: 你可以得到免费的牙齿治疗。
